tr_quotes.quote: Korku: Gerçekmiş gibi görünen yanlış delil
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Korkarak yaşıyorsan sadece hayatı seyredersin.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Sevgi ile doğduk. Korkuyu burada öğrendik.
tr_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

tr_quotes.quote: Korku dost olabilecekleri yabancı yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

tr_quotes.quote: Ne öfkeyle geçmişe, ne de korkuyla geleceğe bakalım, bilinçle etrafımıza bakalım.
tr_quotes.author: James Thurber

tr_quotes.quote: Aynı zamanda korkak ve mutlu olamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Frank Tyger

tr_quotes.quote: Hatadan korkan bir insan hiçbir şey yapamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

tr_quotes.quote: Korku mantıktan daha kuvvetlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat korkunun bittiği yerde başlar.
tr_quotes.author: Osho

tr_quotes.quote: Korku suçu, suç cezayı doğurur.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Korktukça tutsak, umut ettikçe özgürsün.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Korkulacak tek şey korkunun kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Roosevelt

tr_quotes.quote: Korku mantıktan daha kuvvetlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Yunan Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Korku içinde yaşayan, asla hür değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Horatius

tr_quotes.quote: Korku, bütün faziletlerin önüne set çeker.
tr_quotes.author: Horatius

tr_quotes.quote: Korkunun kaynağı, bilgisizliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Gittiğin yola inandıysan, attığın adımlardan korkma.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Korkak yaşayanlar sadece cesur yaşayanların figüranı olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çok defa korku, yalan söylemesini öğretir.
tr_quotes.author: Alfred de Vigny

tr_quotes.quote: Korku dost olabilecekleri yabancı yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

tr_quotes.quote: Korkaklar hiçbir zaman, zafer abideleri dikmemişlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Yönetici için korkutma şiddetin kendisinden daha etkilidir.
tr_quotes.author: Yalçın Küçük

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey, korkudan daha korkunç değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarını korkutanın, kendisi de hep bir korku içinde yaşar.
tr_quotes.author: A. Claudius

tr_quotes.quote: Korktuğunuz biricik şey, korkunun kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

tr_quotes.quote: Acı çekmekten korkan biri, zaten korktuğundan acı çekiyordur.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Korku, yaşam motoru içerisine konulmuş kum gibidir.
tr_quotes.author: A. Stanley Jones

tr_quotes.quote: Kendisinden çok kişinin korktuğu kimse, çok kişiden korkmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Publilius Cyrus

tr_quotes.quote: Korkak, tehlikeyi görünce ayaklarıyla düşünendir.
tr_quotes.author: Pierre Beaumarchais

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta insanı mahveden üç şey: Korkaklık, gurur ve öfkedir.
tr_quotes.author: Visdomsord

tr_quotes.quote: Pek çok kimse, kaçmaktan korktuğu için cesur zannedilmiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Amerika Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Kim çevresine korku yayıyorsa, kendisi de korkuyor demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Epicuros

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları harekete geçirmek için iki manivela vardır. Menfaat ve korku.
tr_quotes.author: Napolyon Bonapart

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın çekeceği acının bir haddi vardır ama korkunun yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatınızın sona ereceğinden korkacağınıza, hiç başlamayacağından korkun.
tr_quotes.author: J. C. Newman

tr_quotes.quote: Sabırsızlık korkudur.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen Zweig

tr_quotes.quote: Korku kimi zaman ayaklarımıza kanat takar, kimi zaman da ayaklarımızı yere çiviler.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar korkulacak şeylerden korkmazlarsa, daha korkunç şeylerle karşılaşırlar.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Ürkek biri tehlikeden önce çekingen, tehlike sırasında korkak, tehlikeden sonra cesurdur.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

tr_quotes.quote: Korkularımızın, bizi umutlarımızın ardına düşmekten alıkoymasına izin vermemeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: J. F. Kennedy

tr_quotes.quote: Korkunun kaynağı gelecekte yatar. Kim gelecekten kurtulmuşsa, korkacak biç bir şeyi yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Milan Kundera

tr_quotes.quote: Korku, karanlık tarafa giden yoldur. Korku öfkeye, öfke nefrete, nefret ise acıya yol açar.
tr_quotes.author: Star Wars

tr_quotes.quote: Çekingen, ürkek ve korkaklar için her şey imkansızdır; çünkü her şeyi imkansız zannederler.
tr_quotes.author: Napolyon Bonapart

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanları harekete geçirmek için iki manivela vardır. Menfaat ve korku.
tr_quotes.author: Napolyon Bonapart

tr_quotes.quote: Bir yandan korkun bir yandan umudun varsa iki kanatlı olursun, tek kanatla uçulmaz zaten.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Allah korkusu, açlık korkusu, ayıp korkusu, en son da vicdan korkusu bulunmayan yerde insan vardır; ama insanlık yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Kazım Taşkent

tr_quotes.quote: Şüpheler ve korkular, hiçbir iş başarmaya yardım etmez, bilakis daima başarısızlığa rehber olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: James Ailen

en_quotes.quote: If fear is cultivated it will become stronger, if faith is cultivated it will achieve mastery
en_quotes.author: John Paul Jones

en_quotes.quote: Fear is a powerful beast. But we can learn to ride it
en_quotes.author: Justine Musk

en_quotes.quote: The eagle has no fear of adversity. We need to be like the eagle and have a fearless spirit of a conqueror!
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Living with fear stops us taking risks, and if you don't go out on the branch, you're never going to get the best fruit
en_quotes.author: Sarah Parish

en_quotes.quote: The key to growth is acknowledging your fear of the unknown and jumping in anyway
en_quotes.author: Jen Sincero

en_quotes.quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles
en_quotes.author: Sun Tzu

en_quotes.quote: There's no fear when you're having fun
en_quotes.author: Will Thomas

en_quotes.quote: The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown
en_quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

en_quotes.quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times
en_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

en_quotes.quote: Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. The fearful are caught as often as the bold
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: Let go of offence. Let go of fear. Let go of revenge. Don't live angry, let go now!
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: If you go deeper and deeper into your own heart, you'll be living in a world with less fear, isolation and loneliness
en_quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

en_quotes.quote: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Limits, like fear, is often an illusion
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Failure seldom stops you. What stops you is the fear of failure
en_quotes.author: Jack Lemmon

en_quotes.quote: We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: There is perhaps nothing so bad and so dangerous in life as fear
en_quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

en_quotes.quote: If you were born really ugly like me, have no fear. There's steps you can take to be good-looking. Kind of
en_quotes.author: Jenna Marbles

en_quotes.quote: I'll tell you what freedom is to me: no fear. I mean really, no fear!
en_quotes.author: Nina Simone

en_quotes.quote: There are only two forces that unite men - fear and interest
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: War is hell. You can't photograph a flying bullet, but you can capture genuine fear
en_quotes.author: Horst Faas

en_quotes.quote: Being brave isn't the absence of fear. Being brave is having that fear but finding a way through it
en_quotes.author: Bear Grylls

en_quotes.quote: Shame is the most powerful, master emotion. It's the fear that we're not good enough
en_quotes.author: Brene Brown

en_quotes.quote: Being aware of your fear is smart. Overcoming it is the mark of a successful person
en_quotes.author: Seth Godin

en_quotes.quote: I think fearless is having fears but jumping anyway
en_quotes.author: Taylor Swift

en_quotes.quote: Fear is the lengthened shadow of ignorance
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: We have the force, the energy, and the determination, and we will not give in to fear
en_quotes.author: Emmanuel Macron

en_quotes.quote: When you have no fear, the possibilities are endless
en_quotes.author: Jeffree Star

en_quotes.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Never fear to deliberately walk through dark places, for that is how you reach the light on the other side
en_quotes.author: Vernon Howard

en_quotes.quote: Kill the snake of doubt in your soul, crush the worms of fear in your heart and mountains will move out of your way
en_quotes.author: Kate Seredy

en_quotes.quote: I believe that every single event in life happens in an opportunity to choose love over fear
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: You can like or dislike me. You are entitled to form an opinion about me, and I don't fear being judged
en_quotes.author: Hina Khan

en_quotes.quote: But to be the best, you must face the best. And to overcome your fear, you must deal with the best
en_quotes.author: Barry Bonds

en_quotes.quote: Men are moved by two levers only: fear and self interest
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear
en_quotes.author: Plato

en_quotes.quote: Fears are nothing more than a state of mind
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: I have a vision of India: an India free of hunger and fear, an India free of illiteracy and want
en_quotes.author: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

en_quotes.quote: You can break through old limits, past inertia and fear, to... richness of choice, freedom, human closeness
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

en_quotes.quote: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: My biggest fear is looking weak, girly, and pathetic
en_quotes.author: Lucy Griffiths

en_quotes.quote: If you look into your own heart, and you find nothing wrong there, what is there to worry about? What is there to fear?
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you
en_quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

en_quotes.quote: Fear is the dark room where the Devil develops his negatives
en_quotes.author: Gary Busey

en_quotes.quote: Fear not, we are of the nature of the lion, and cannot descend to the destruction of mice and such small beasts
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth I

en_quotes.quote: You need to let go of your fear and anxiety of being judged by others
en_quotes.author: Gavin Newsom

en_quotes.quote: I do not fear Satan half so much as I fear those who fear him
en_quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

en_quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way
en_quotes.author: Babe Ruth

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty always creates doubt, and doubt creates fear
en_quotes.author: Oscar Munoz

en_quotes.quote: My main focus in sobriety has been to replace fear with faith or love
en_quotes.author: Steve-O

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has his faults which he continually repeats: neither fear nor shame can cure them
en_quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

en_quotes.quote: An appeal to fear never finds an echo in German hearts
en_quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

en_quotes.quote: The threat or fear of violence should not become an excuse or justification for restricting freedom of speech
en_quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

en_quotes.quote: We should not be afraid to go into a new era, to leave the old beyond
en_quotes.author: Zach Wamp

en_quotes.quote: A good spicy challenge strikes a balance between flavour and fear
en_quotes.author: Adam Richman

en_quotes.quote: It is not these well-fed long-haired men that I fear, but the pale and the hungry-looking
en_quotes.author: Julius Caesar

en_quotes.quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: Yoga is a way to freedom. By its constant practice, we can free ourselves from fear, anguish and loneliness
en_quotes.author: Indra Devi

en_quotes.quote: Fear is stupid. So are regrets
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: The greatest mistake we make is living in constant fear that we will make one
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Those who own much have much to fear
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: We simply attempt to be fearful when others are greedy and to be greedy only when others are fearful
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: Action can cure fear and hesitation and doubt
en_quotes.author: Lewis Howes

en_quotes.quote: The secret of life is to have no fear; it's the only way to function
en_quotes.author: Stokely Carmichael

en_quotes.quote: As soon as the fear approaches near, attack and destroy it
en_quotes.author: Chanakya

en_quotes.quote: You don't have to fear defeat if you believe it may reveal powers that you didn't know you possessed
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: I have this fear of clowns, so I think that if I surround myself with them, it will ward off all evil
en_quotes.author: Johnny Depp

en_quotes.quote: Audacity augments courage; hesitation, fear
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: Vertigo is the conflict between the fear of falling and the desire to fall
en_quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

en_quotes.quote: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: Things done well and with a care, exempt themselves from fear
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: A cheerful frame of mind, reinforced by relaxation... is the medicine that puts all ghosts of fear on the run
en_quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

en_quotes.quote: I tremble for my country when I reflect that God is just; that his justice cannot sleep forever
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: The biggest challenge or biggest crisis knocking on the doors of humankind is fear and intolerance
en_quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

en_quotes.quote: I fear no man, no beast or evil, brother
en_quotes.author: Hulk Hogan

en_quotes.quote: I'm not one of those guys that has a great worldview. I kind of deal with terror and fear and isolation and abandonment
en_quotes.author: David Bowie

en_quotes.quote: Every journey starts with fear
en_quotes.author: Jake Gyllenhaal

en_quotes.quote: In time we hate that which we often fear
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend
en_quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

en_quotes.quote: Action cures fear. Indecision, postponement, on the other hand, fertilize fear
en_quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: Men are swayed more by fear than by reverence
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: I fear all we have done is to awaken a sleeping giant and fill him with a terrible resolve
en_quotes.author: Isoroku Yamamoto

en_quotes.quote: Courage is a mean with regard to fear and confidence
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Life is a balance of fear and overcoming it
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Iovine

en_quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to see what you see
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: The more I traveled the more I realized that fear makes strangers of people who should be friends
en_quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

en_quotes.quote: Fear not, the people may be deluded for a moment, but cannot be corrupted
en_quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater
en_quotes.author: George Washington Carver

en_quotes.quote: People are just afraid of things too much. Afraid of things that don't necessarily merit fear
en_quotes.author: Frank Ocean

en_quotes.quote: I am pretty fearless, and you know why? Because I don't handle fear very well; I'm not a good terrified person
en_quotes.author: Stevie Nicks

en_quotes.quote: If you have an issue with homosexuality, then it comes to your own fear and your own darkness
en_quotes.author: Tori Amos

en_quotes.quote: When men don't fear God, they give themselves to evil
en_quotes.author: Ray Comfort

en_quotes.quote: Great work is done by people who are not afraid to be great
en_quotes.author: Fernando Flores

en_quotes.quote: So fear helps me from making mistakes, but I make lot of mistakes
en_quotes.author: Steve Irwin

en_quotes.quote: I fear God and next to God I mostly fear them that fear him not
en_quotes.author: Saadi

en_quotes.quote: I've spent most of my life in prison. I was a prisoner of my fear and my low self-esteem
en_quotes.author: Gerry Cooney

en_quotes.quote: Man's loneliness is but his fear of life
en_quotes.author: Eugene O'Neill

en_quotes.quote: Fear the vulture, and the vulture will come. Fear nothing, and you are the vulture
en_quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

en_quotes.quote: You don't know what bravery is until you overcome fear
en_quotes.author: Kurt Elling

en_quotes.quote: Boldness is a mask for fear, however great
en_quotes.author: John Dryden

en_quotes.quote: Embrace the fear and go for it. That's what I do. I don't run from it - I embrace the fear
en_quotes.author: Jamie Brewer

en_quotes.quote: A merchant who approaches business with the idea of serving the public well has nothing to fear from the competition
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: It may be you fear more to deliver judgment upon me than I fear judgment
en_quotes.author: Giordano Bruno

en_quotes.quote: Don't fear change - embrace it
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: It is the strange fate of man, that even in the greatest of evils the fear of the worst continues to haunt him
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: In the cold, shivering twilight, preceding the daybreak of civilization, the dominating emotion of man was fear
en_quotes.author: Paul P. Harris

en_quotes.quote: Never be afraid to sit a while and think
en_quotes.author: Lorraine Hansberry

en_quotes.quote: Fear tastes like a rusty knife and do not let her into your house
en_quotes.author: John Cheever

en_quotes.quote: I like to do something I fear
en_quotes.author: Heath Ledger

en_quotes.quote: The strongest passion is fear
en_quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

en_quotes.quote: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear
en_quotes.author: Richard Bach

en_quotes.quote: Fear clogs; faith liberates
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Worry is a cycle of inefficient thoughts whirling around a center of fear
en_quotes.author: Corrie Ten Boom

en_quotes.quote: I don't want the fear of failure to stop me from doing what I really care about
en_quotes.author: Emma Watson

en_quotes.quote: I truly believe that building bridges, not building walls and not giving into fear, will make our communities better
en_quotes.author: Charles Barkley

en_quotes.quote: You've got to kick fear to the side, because the payoff is huge
en_quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

en_quotes.quote: The only thing I fear more than change is no change. The business of being static makes me nuts
en_quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

en_quotes.quote: The most destructive element in the human mind is fear. Fear creates aggressiveness
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

en_quotes.quote: It's the most unhappy people who most fear change
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: A fear of the unknown keeps a lot of people from leaving bad situations
en_quotes.author: Kathie Lee Gifford

en_quotes.quote: Fear, to me, is a guiding thing more than anything
en_quotes.author: Mac Miller

en_quotes.quote: I have no fear of being less beautiful, I've always been afraid of not being beautiful
en_quotes.author: Isabelle Adjani

en_quotes.quote: That man is prudent who neither hopes nor fears anything from the uncertain events of the future
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: All religions are founded on the fear of the many and the cleverness of the few
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: There are very few monsters who warrant the fear we have of them
en_quotes.author: Andre Gide

en_quotes.quote: Action cures fear, inaction creates terror
en_quotes.author: Douglas Horton

en_quotes.quote: There are few things more liberating in this life than having your worst fear realized
en_quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

en_quotes.quote: Fear of failure must never be a reason not to try something
en_quotes.author: Frederick W. Smith

en_quotes.quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Tell us your phobias and we will tell you what you are afraid of
en_quotes.author: Robert Benchley

en_quotes.quote: Greatness comes from fear. Fear can either shut us down and we go home, or we fight through it
en_quotes.author: Lionel Richie

en_quotes.quote: There is a time to take counsel of your fears, and there is a time to never listen to any fear
en_quotes.author: George S. Patton

en_quotes.quote: A man who is not afraid is not aggressive, a man who has no sense of fear of any kind is really a free, a peaceful man
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: Fear is not a good teacher. The lessons of fear are quickly forgotten
en_quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

en_quotes.quote: Fear not those who argue but those who dodge
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Love and fear. Everything the father of a family says must inspire one or the other
en_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

en_quotes.quote: I have a wish. It as a fear as well - that in my end will be my beginning
en_quotes.author: Che Guevara

en_quotes.quote: No fear' is a mindset that I stand for. It's the reason why I've got to where I am today
en_quotes.author: Skepta

en_quotes.quote: Men shrink less from offending one who inspires love than one who inspires fear
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: Puritanism. The haunting fear that someone, somewhere, may be happy
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Just as courage is the danger of life, so is fear its safeguard
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: Fear is the mother of morality
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: I have gained this from philosophy: that I do without being commanded what others do only from fear of the law
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Discipline strengthens the mind so that it becomes impervious to the corroding influence of fear
en_quotes.author: Bernard Law Montgomery

en_quotes.quote: Vaccines save lives; fear endangers them. It's a simple message parents need to keep hearing
en_quotes.author: Jeffrey Kluger

en_quotes.quote: Do not fear mistakes. You will know failure. Continue to reach out
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Fear has its use but cowardice has none
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Fear is the mother of foresight
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

en_quotes.quote: We must not fear daylight just because it almost always illuminates a miserable world
en_quotes.author: Rene Magritte

en_quotes.quote: Hunger and fear are the only realities in dog life: an empty stomach makes a fierce dog
en_quotes.author: Robert Falcon Scott

en_quotes.quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them
en_quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

en_quotes.quote: Prosperity is not without many fears and distastes; adversity not without many comforts and hopes
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: It's not necessary to fear the prospect of failure but to be determined not to fail
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

en_quotes.quote: Fear doesn't exist anywhere except in the mind
en_quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

en_quotes.quote: Shyness is invariably a suppression of something. It's almost a fear of what you're capable of
en_quotes.author: Rhys Ifans

en_quotes.quote: Because of the lack of education on AIDS, discrimination, fear, panic, and lies surrounded me
en_quotes.author: Ryan White

en_quotes.quote: Let us never negotiate out of fear. But let us never fear to negotiate
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Fear has many eyes and can see things underground
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

en_quotes.quote: The problem is not getting rid of fear, but using it properly
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: I don't fear anyone. We don't come to play in this sport
en_quotes.author: Canelo Alvarez

en_quotes.quote: None but a coward dares to boast that he has never known fear
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Fear follows crime and is its punishment
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Courage consists not in hazarding without fear; but being resolutely minded in a just cause
en_quotes.author: Plutarch

en_quotes.quote: The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: Unhappy is he to whom the memories of childhood bring only fear and sadness
en_quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

en_quotes.quote: I more fear what is within me than what comes from without
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Valor grows by daring, fear by holding back
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: I never dared to be radical when young for fear it would make me conservative when old
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: I have a fear of water, believe it or not. To put a wire 12 feet over a swimming pool frightens me. I don't like water
en_quotes.author: Philippe Petit

en_quotes.quote: Fear is the highest fence
en_quotes.author: Dudley Nichols

en_quotes.quote: Fear cannot be banished, but it can be calm and without panic; it can be mitigated by reason and evaluation
en_quotes.author: Vannevar Bush

en_quotes.quote: We need to kind of refresh our fear in order to refresh our understanding of how a safe place works
en_quotes.author: Andrew Pyper

en_quotes.quote: Find out what you're afraid of and go live there
en_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

en_quotes.quote: My only fear is that I may live too long. This would be a subject of dread to me
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: There are times when fear is good. It must keep its watchful place at the heart's controls
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: FOMO (fear of missing out) is the enemy of valuing your own time
en_quotes.author: Andrew Yang

en_quotes.quote: Fools rush in where angels fear to tread
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: There is no greater hell than to be a prisoner of fear
en_quotes.author: Ben Jonson

en_quotes.quote: If I wanted to go be social I would. I don't have any fear of that. I don't feel like I'm a shy person at all
en_quotes.author: Tobey Maguire

en_quotes.quote: I greatly fear some of America's greatest and most dangerous enemies are such as think themselves her best friends
en_quotes.author: Nathan Hale

en_quotes.quote: To good and true love fear is forever affixed
en_quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

en_quotes.quote: Discipline is simply the art of making the soldiers fear their officers more than the enemy
en_quotes.author: Claude Adrien Helvetius

en_quotes.quote: I am always scared before going on stage; this is the fear which makes me do well
en_quotes.author: Kapil Sharma

en_quotes.quote: TO fear God, is one of the first and greatest Duties of his rational Creatures
en_quotes.author: Charles Inglis

en_quotes.quote: I guess my weirdest fear is accidentally ingesting a sharp object
en_quotes.author: Willa Fitzgerald

en_quotes.quote: Fain would I climb, yet fear I to fall
en_quotes.author: Walter Raleigh

en_quotes.quote: Boredom is... a vital problem for the moralist, since half the sins of mankind are caused by the fear of it
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Thinking will not overcome fear but action will
en_quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

en_quotes.quote: We fear to know the fearsome and unsavory aspects of ourselves, but we fear even more to know the godlike in ourselves
en_quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

en_quotes.quote: I will show you fear in a handful of dust
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Fear may come true that which one is afraid of
en_quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

en_quotes.quote: I fear my enthusiasm flags when real work is demanded of me
en_quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

en_quotes.quote: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: I really believed that fear is contagious
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: So the Marine Corps really did teach me to conquer fear, and then to go for higher causes, higher purposes
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: I put so much of myself out there and make myself so accessible that sometimes I fear I make myself too accessible
en_quotes.author: Halsey

en_quotes.quote: Every game, you've got to play with no fear
en_quotes.author: Jesse Lingard

en_quotes.quote: The process of spotting fear and refusing to obey it is the source of all true empowerment
en_quotes.author: Martha Beck

en_quotes.quote: There is greatness in the fear of God, contentment in faith of God, and honour in humility
en_quotes.author: Abu Bakr

en_quotes.quote: People with bad consciences always fear the judgment of children
en_quotes.author: Mary McCarthy

en_quotes.quote: Should we fear hackers? Intention is at the heart of this discussion
en_quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

en_quotes.quote: There is no fear before and no fear after. We give our best
en_quotes.author: Rickie Lee Jones

en_quotes.quote: Slowness to change usually means fear of the new
en_quotes.author: Phil Crosby

en_quotes.quote: Show me a guy who's afraid to look bad, and I'll show you a guy you can beat every time
en_quotes.author: Lou Brock

en_quotes.quote: People react to fear, not love; they don't teach that in Sunday School, but it's true
en_quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

en_quotes.quote: Having a child, that's always been my biggest fear. I want a child and I fear a child
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: Man's greatest fear is chaos
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

en_quotes.quote: I wore a mullet to the Grammys! I have no fear
en_quotes.author: Zendaya

en_quotes.quote: I don't have any fear of intimacy, but rather thrive on it, which is rare in a public person
en_quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

en_quotes.quote: To pity distress is but human; to relieve it is Godlike
en_quotes.author: Horace Mann

en_quotes.quote: To have a great man for an intimate friend seems pleasant to those who have never tried it; those who have, fear it
en_quotes.author: Homer

en_quotes.quote: He will never have true friends who is afraid of making enemies
en_quotes.author: William Hazlitt

en_quotes.quote: Fear invariably and universally induces disengagement, and disengagement is negative division of labor
en_quotes.author: Alan Greenspan

en_quotes.quote: I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own
en_quotes.author: Jackson Pollock

en_quotes.quote: Do not look upon this world with fear and loathing. Bravely face whatever the gods offer
en_quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

en_quotes.quote: True nobility is exempt from fear
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Fear is not a lasting teacher of duty
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Courage is... the knowledge of how to fear what ought to be feared and how not to fear what ought not to be feared
en_quotes.author: David Ben-Gurion

en_quotes.quote: There is the theory... that you live in two places: You either live in fear, or you live in love
en_quotes.author: Michael Keaton

en_quotes.quote: We crucify ourselves between two thieves: regret for yesterday and fear of tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Fulton Oursler

en_quotes.quote: When love is absent, then there is fear, and in my opinion you should lead your entire life through love
en_quotes.author: Lauren London

en_quotes.quote: My biggest fear in life is to be forgotten
en_quotes.author: Evita Peron

en_quotes.quote: Always be courageous and strong, and don't fear
en_quotes.author: Gabby Douglas

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing in this world that I fear to say
en_quotes.author: Dmitri Mendeleev

en_quotes.quote: I have no fear of photography as long as it cannot be used in heaven and in hell
en_quotes.author: Edvard Munch

en_quotes.quote: The only answer to fear is faith in God, knowing He loves you unconditionally and individually
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Fear is a spirit that produces a feeling
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you must suffer through something to defeat your fear of it
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: We consume our tomorrows fretting about our yesterdays
en_quotes.author: Persius

en_quotes.quote: Fear is always there; it's a survival instinct. You just need to know how to manage it
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Chin

en_quotes.quote: The Japanese do not fear God. They only fear bombs
en_quotes.author: Jerome Cady

en_quotes.quote: Fear drives you a lot harder than success does
en_quotes.author: Nick Woodman

en_quotes.quote: Some days it is a heroic act just to refuse the paralysis of fear and straighten up and step into another day
en_quotes.author: Edward Albert

en_quotes.quote: I had a fear of being alone
en_quotes.author: Gloria Gaynor

en_quotes.quote: No passion so effectually robs the mind of all its powers of acting and reasoning as fear
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: We lavish on animals the love we are afraid to show to people. They might not return it; or worse, they might
en_quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

en_quotes.quote: I am so tired of fear. And I don't want my girls to live in a country, in a world, based on fear
en_quotes.author: Michelle Obama

en_quotes.quote: As a child, I was more afraid of tetanus shots than, for example, Dracula
en_quotes.author: Dave Barry

en_quotes.quote: If you flee from the things you fear, there's no resolution
en_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

en_quotes.quote: There is no nation so powerful, as the one that obeys its laws not from principals of fear or reason, but from passion
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: I fear the Greeks, even when they bring gifts
en_quotes.author: Virgil

en_quotes.quote: The thirst for powerful sensations takes the upper hand both over fear and over compassion for the grief of others
en_quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

en_quotes.quote: I think so many people live their whole life in fear and doubt and shame
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Being brought up very religious, I have a fear of people that look to idol gods
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Men! The only animal in the world to fear
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: When a match has equal partners then I fear not
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: Scalded cats fear even cold water
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: A person's fears are lighter when the danger is at hand
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: The thinner the ice, the more anxious is everyone to see whether it will bear
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as paranoia. Your worst fears can come true at any moment
en_quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

en_quotes.quote: My only fear is the unknown
en_quotes.author: David Blaine

en_quotes.quote: My dad always tell me to make decisions from love and not from fear
en_quotes.author: Rashida Jones

en_quotes.quote: I won't allow myself to have tremendous fear
en_quotes.author: Calvin Klein

en_quotes.quote: Fear is natural. Be with it
en_quotes.author: Thomas Leonard

en_quotes.quote: Good men have the fewest fears. He has but one great fear who fears to do wrong; he has a thousand who has overcome it
en_quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

en_quotes.quote: I believe that truth is one of the most powerful tools we possess against victimization, exploitation, and fear
en_quotes.author: Janet Varney

en_quotes.quote: The three traits speculators must learn to manage within themselves are confidence, fear, and aggressiveness
en_quotes.author: Larry Williams

en_quotes.quote: Worry does not mean fear, but readiness for the confrontation
en_quotes.author: Bashar al-Assad

en_quotes.quote: My mother was a very sweet soul and a beautiful person, but she had a lot of fear
en_quotes.author: John Grant

en_quotes.quote: Fear is, I believe, a most effective tool in destroying the soul of an individual - and the soul of a people
en_quotes.author: Anwar Sadat

en_quotes.quote: Accepting fear head-on is freeing
en_quotes.author: Nina Tassler

en_quotes.quote: To fight fear, act. To increase fear - wait, put off postpone
en_quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: There are some things that as an actor scare you, and if you can capture that fear on screen, it will be interesting
en_quotes.author: Alice Lowe

en_quotes.quote: I think 30 is a big jump from your 20s, but 40 holds no fear for me
en_quotes.author: Rachel Hunter

en_quotes.quote: That fear first created the gods is perhaps as true as anything so brief could be on so great a subject
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: The fearful unbelief is unbelief in yourself
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather give my life than be afraid to give it
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I say I am stronger than fear
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: Fear makes us feel our humanity
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: The fear of becoming a 'has-been' keeps some people from becoming anything
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: The Christian fear of the pagan outlook has damaged the whole consciousness of man
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: How very little can be done under the spirit of fear
en_quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

en_quotes.quote: They who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure
en_quotes.author: James Allen

en_quotes.quote: I know that when we interact with those we fear and hate, we will find commonality
en_quotes.author: Ilhan Omar

en_quotes.quote: The record company's worst fear is that you'll fall in love or get rich
en_quotes.author: Maynard James Keenan

en_quotes.quote: Fear is static that prevents me from hearing myself
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: We are afraid of the enormity of the possible
en_quotes.author: Emil Cioran

en_quotes.quote: I didn't fear failure. I expected failure
en_quotes.author: Amy Tan

en_quotes.quote: The pleasures of love are always in proportion to our fears
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: Love is what we were born with. Fear is what we learned here
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: I think if you have any fear or shame, it's really hard to want to express yourself
en_quotes.author: Rumer Willis

en_quotes.quote: It is the perpetual dread of fear, the fear of fear, that shapes the face of a brave man
en_quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

en_quotes.quote: People who say, 'There's nothing to fear from spiders' have clearly never been to Australia
en_quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

en_quotes.quote: I fear God. If my time comes, my time comes
en_quotes.author: Denzel Curry

en_quotes.quote: I am good with heights, but my biggest fear was creepy crawlies
en_quotes.author: Hina Khan

en_quotes.quote: An ugly sight, a man who is afraid
en_quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

en_quotes.quote: Use the energy that fear creates to focus the mind more intently on the present moment - where fear doesn't exist
en_quotes.author: John Mackey

en_quotes.quote: Stalking is a crime that can paralyze an otherwise productive person with fear
en_quotes.author: Lisa Madigan

en_quotes.quote: I have a fear of being broke. That's what I have a fear of. I'm not kidding
en_quotes.author: Loni Love

en_quotes.quote: War is fear cloaked in courage
en_quotes.author: William Westmoreland

en_quotes.quote: Fear nothing; attack everything
en_quotes.author: Eric Berry

en_quotes.quote: Identifying and overcoming natural fear is one of the pleasing struggles intrinsic to climbing
en_quotes.author: Alex Lowe

en_quotes.quote: The first duty of man is to conquer fear; he must get rid of it, he cannot act till then
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: To him who is in fear everything rustles
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: One had to take some action against fear when once it laid hold of one
en_quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

en_quotes.quote: There is no passion so contagious as that of fear
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: I have never known any distress that an hour's reading did not relieve
en_quotes.author: Montesquieu

en_quotes.quote: My 'fear' is my substance, and probably the best part of me
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: Everyone wishes that the man whom he fears would perish
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Minds that are ill at ease are agitated by both hope and fear
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Every man, through fear, mugs his aspirations a dozen times a day
en_quotes.author: Brendan Behan

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately we know deeply that the other side of every fear is freedom
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Ferguson

en_quotes.quote: Why is it that when we get older, we get more fearful?
en_quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

en_quotes.quote: I love the idea that horror and fear is a celebration of health and life
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: He whom many fear, has himself many to fear
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: Let the fear of danger be a spur to prevent it; he that fears not, gives advantage to the danger
en_quotes.author: Francis Quarles

en_quotes.quote: Nothing gives a fearful man more courage than another's fear
en_quotes.author: Umberto Eco

en_quotes.quote: I'm different, and my manner invites questions. I'm never afraid to answer
en_quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing that fear and hope does not permit men to do
en_quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers

en_quotes.quote: We often pretend to fear what we really despise, and more often despise what we really fear
en_quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

en_quotes.quote: I have a fear of being boring
en_quotes.author: Christian Bale

en_quotes.quote: Courage is a peculiar kind of fear
en_quotes.author: Charles Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: We fear the thing we want the most
en_quotes.author: Robert Anthony

en_quotes.quote: We fear things in proportion to our ignorance of them
en_quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

en_quotes.quote: The mark of fear is not easily removed
en_quotes.author: Ernest Gaines

en_quotes.quote: What we have most to fear is failure of the heart
en_quotes.author: Sonia Johnson

en_quotes.quote: The key to change... is to let go of fear
en_quotes.author: Rosanne Cash

en_quotes.quote: I hasten to laugh at everything, for fear of being obliged to weep
en_quotes.author: Pierre Beaumarchais

en_quotes.quote: No one should have to live in fear
en_quotes.author: Jeff Fortenberry

en_quotes.quote: A child understands fear, and the hurt and hate it brings
en_quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

en_quotes.quote: Do what you fear and fear disappears
en_quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: No good work is ever done while the heart is hot and anxious and fretted
en_quotes.author: Olive Schreiner

en_quotes.quote: When you're fearful, you stumble
en_quotes.author: Jenna Jameson

en_quotes.quote: I think what weakens people most is fear of wasting their strength
en_quotes.author: Etty Hillesum

en_quotes.quote: Fear is excitement without breath
en_quotes.author: Robert Heller
